thread.title: Att n-tion! There's a new Dad's Army poster
thread.title_full: Att n-tion! There's a new Dad's Army poster

title: Att n-tion! There's a new Dad's Army poster
text:
Att n-tion! There's a new Dad's Army poster Att n-tion! There's a new Dad's Army poster 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Don’t panic! There’s a brand new Dad’s Army poster to keep fans excited until the film marches into cinemas next year. 
In the new poster, the cast have gathered on a grassy mound, carrying a Union Jack for the patriotic shot. 
And on the day the Star Wars: The Force Awakens trailer went live, the cheeky strapline referenced film history with: “The British Empire Strikes Back.” The new Dad’s Army poster (Universal) 
All the key players are there, led by Toby Jones’s Captain Mainwaring and Bill Nighy’s Sergeant Wilson. 
They’re joined by Corporal Jones (Tom Courtenay), Private Godfrey (Michael Gambon), Private Pike (Blake Harrison) and Private Walker (Danny Mays). 
Catherine Zeta-Jones joins as journalist Rose Winters, who’s writing an article about the home guard. Share article 
Dad’s Army will be released in UK cinemas on February 5. Promoted Stories
